content: आस्कंदः, --दनं {@--1@} An attack, assault; assailing, outraging; परवनिता °प्रगल्भस्य <ls>Ve. 2.</ls> {@--2@} Ascending, mounting; treading, stepping over; <ls>Ki. 13. 18.</ls> {@--3@} Reproach, abuse. {@--4@} The walk of a horse. {@--5@} An assailant. {@--6@} Battle, war. {@--7@} Drying. {@--8@} Effacing, destroying.
